meanings.definition: Relating to or consisting of neuroglia.
meanings.sent1: The neuroglial cells provide support to the neurons in the brain.
meanings.sent2: The neuroglial tissue helps protect the nervous system.
meanings.sent3: The neuroglial support team in the brain always has the neurons' backs.
meanings.sent4: The neuroglial network acts like a shield around the neurons.
meanings.sent5: The neuroglial structures form a protective barrier around the nerve cells.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the supportive tissue of the nervous system.
meanings.sent1: Proper care of the neuroglial tissue is essential for a healthy nervous system.
meanings.sent2: The neuroglial support system plays a crucial role in maintaining nerve health.
meanings.sent3: The neuroglial tissue is like the cozy blanket that keeps the nervous system warm.
meanings.sent4: The neuroglial network acts as a guardian for the nervous system.
meanings.sent5: The neuroglial tissue is the unsung hero of the nervous system, silently providing support.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the cells that support and protect neurons.
meanings.sent1: The neuroglial cells work tirelessly to protect the neurons from harm.
meanings.sent2: Neurons rely on neuroglial cells for their support and protection.
meanings.sent3: The neuroglial cells are like the bodyguards of the neurons, always vigilant.
meanings.sent4: The neuroglial shield surrounds the neurons like a protective fortress.
meanings.sent5: Neuroglial cells are the unsung heroes that keep neurons safe and sound.
